game.name: Rebel Forces
game.description:
The biggest action packed challenge we have come today for you. Do you think that it is a right time to accept it? If yes, join Rebel Forces and show the world that you are also blessed with intense fighting skills. Click the Campaign and be prepared to enter one of the highly challenging battlefields where there is no space for the mistakes. You have to fight other players and put your ultimate shooting skills to eliminate all your enemies in this crazy combat. 
It will be amazing to play the role of a brave soldier who is ready to put his life at risk to save his nation in this action-packed first-person shooter game. Choose to play either online against other players or solo in campaign 
mode. Do not forget to lace up your boots and put your gun straight to shoot down any hostiles that you see on your way! This HTML5 shooting game features 3 game modes, 6 maps to explore and room options for double speed. 
In campaign mode, there are missions where your winning will only depend on how quickly you take down your enemy soldiers. The successful completion of each will help you collect some points and money through which you can purchase advanced equipment and weapons. In the online mode, players from all across the world will be there to combat. Deathmatch, team deathmatch and Doom are three game modes to play for free. A military base environment will create a realistic fighting environment. Enjoy single player or multiplayer mode as per your choice.

game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Rebel Forces at atmegame.com ! We have selected this  games for best excitement and thrill in you!

game.webControlKeys: W,A,S,D ALL ARROWS TO MOVE,Z-RUN, SPACE-JUMP, C- SIT, L CLICK- SHOOT, R - RELOAD, WHEEL- CHANGE THYE WEAPON
